file_content.text: If you see Drooga, tell him to come back here for me!
Drooga the Hutt is insane! Absolutely mad! What kind of lunatic takes his party into the Nikto Sector?
I stepped off his pleasure barge for one moment to conduct a simple financial transaction, and now I can't rejoin his party!
I value my life too much to risk it among those thieves and murderers in the Nikto Sector. I'll just wait here. Blast Drooga!
You haven't heard of the Nikto Sector? Gangsters everywhere. Battles in the streets. Drooga's gambling with everyone's lives down there!
You'd have better odds of surviving the asteroid field!
I'm a businessman. The best deals are happening on that pleasure barge, but they aren't worth dying over.
If you're going to chase that deranged Hutt's party, I suggest you settle your affairs, first.
Blasted Drooga... I never even got a drink!
A word of advice: never attend one of Drooga the Hutt's parties. What a horrible host!
